GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns the type of the ApiLayout class.

SetName.name: SetName
SetName.description: Sets a name to the current layout.

AddObject.name: AddObject
AddObject.description: Adds an object (image, shape or chart) to the current slide layout.

params.name: oDrawing
params.description: The object which will be added to the current slide layout.

RemoveObject.name: RemoveObject
RemoveObject.description: Removes objects (image, shape or chart) from the current slide layout.

params.name: nPos
params.description: Position from which the object will be deleted.

SetBackground.name: SetBackground
SetBackground.description: Sets the background to the current slide layout.

params.name: oApiFill
params.description: The color or pattern used to fill the presentation slide layout background.\

FollowMasterBackground.name: FollowMasterBackground
FollowMasterBackground.description: Sets the master background as the background of the layout.

Copy.name: Copy
Copy.description: Creates a copy of the specified slide layout object. Copies without master slide.

Delete.name: Delete
Delete.description: Deletes the specified object from the parent slide master if it exists.

Duplicate.name: Duplicate
Duplicate.description: Creates a duplicate of the specified slide layout object, adds the new slide layout to the slide layout collection.

params.name: nPos
params.description: Position where the new slide layout will be added.

MoveTo.name: MoveTo
MoveTo.description: Moves the specified layout to a specific location within the same collection.

params.name: nPos
params.description: Position where the specified slide layout will be moved to.

GetAllDrawings.name: GetAllDrawings
GetAllDrawings.description: Returns an array with all the drawing objects from the slide layout.

GetAllShapes.name: GetAllShapes
GetAllShapes.description: Returns an array with all the shape objects from the slide layout.

GetAllImages.name: GetAllImages
GetAllImages.description: Returns an array with all the image objects from the slide layout.

GetAllCharts.name: GetAllCharts
GetAllCharts.description: Returns an array with all the chart objects from the slide layout.

GetAllOleObjects.name: GetAllOleObjects
GetAllOleObjects.description: Returns an array with all the OLE objects from the slide layout.

GetMaster.name: GetMaster
GetMaster.description: Returns the parent slide master of the current layout.

ToJSON.name: ToJSON
ToJSON.description: Converts the ApiLayout object into the JSON object.

params.name: bWriteMaster
params.description: Specifies if the slide master will be written to the JSON object or not.

params.name: bWriteTableStyles
params.description: Specifies whether to write used table styles to the JSON object (true) or not (false).
